p: Dengue virus (DENV) belongs to the family of Flaviviridae and genus Flavivirus and poses a global threat resulting in significant morbidity and mortality. The virus is transmitted by day-biting mosquito, Aedes aegypti ( Liu-Helmersson et al., 2014). However, there is no vaccine or antiviral drug available that can neutralize all the four serotypes of dengue viruses.
